testCase.name: should create a new employee successfully
should return 409 if the employee already exists
should fetch all employees successfully
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should find employee by ID successfully
should return 404 if no employee is found
should update employee successfully
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should create a new manager successfully
should return 409 if the user already exists
should fetch all managers successfully
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should return a manager by ID successfully
should return 404 if no manager is found
should update manager successfully
should return a custom error message for testing
should create a new product successfully
should handle errors correctly
should fetch all products successfully
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should find a product by id successfully
should return 404 if the product is not found
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should inactivate a product successfully
should return 404 if the product is not found
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should patch a product successfully
should return 404 if the product is not found
should return 500 if there is an internal server error
should create a new sale successfully
should return 400 if the request payload is invalid
should handle service errors
should fetch all sales for a valid userId
should handle service errors
should fetch all sales successfully
should return 500 if an error occurs
should fetch sale by ID successfully
should return 404 if sale is not found
should return 500 if an error occurs
createSupplier Controller - should create a new supplier and return it
createSupplier Controller - should return a 400 error if validation fails
deleteSupplier Controller - should delete a supplier and return a 204 status
deleteSupplier Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
fetchAllSupplier Controller - should fetch all suppliers and return them
fetchAllSupplier Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
fetchManyByCompanyName Controller - should fetch suppliers by company name and return them
fetchManyByCompanyName Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
fetchManyBySocialName Controller - should fetch suppliers by social name and return them
fetchManyBySocialName Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
findSupplierById Controller - should fetch supplier by ID and return it
findSupplierById Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
patchSupplier Controller - should update supplier and return the updated supplier
patchSupplier Controller - should handle validation errors and return a 400 status code
patchSupplier Controller - should handle errors from the service and return a 500 status code
authenticateUser Controller - should authenticate the user and return a token
authenticateUser Controller - should return 400 if credentials are invalid
authenticateUser Controller - should throw an error if an unknown error occurs
deleteUser Controller - should delete the user and return a success message
deleteUser Controller - should return 404 if the user is not found
deleteUser Controller - should return 500 if an unknown error occurs
fetchAllUsers Controller - should return all users successfully
fetchAllUsers Controller - should return 500 if an error occurs
findUserByid Controller - should return the user successfully
findUserByid Controller - should return 404 if the user is not found
findUserByid Controller - should return 500 if an error occurs
profile Controller - should return user profile and manager if the user is a manager
profile Controller - should return 404 if the role is not found
profile Controller - should return 500 if an error occurs
Create Employee Service - should be able to create a new employee
Create Employee Service - should not allow creating a new employee with an existing email
Fetch All Employee Service - should be able to fetch all employees
Find Employee by ID Service - should be able to find an employee by ID
Find Employee by ID Service - should return null if employee is not found
Find Employee by User ID Service - should be able to find an employee by User ID
Find Employee by User ID Service - should return null if employee with User ID is not found
Update Employee Service - should be able to update an employee
Update Employee Service - should update an employee without changing the password
Update Employee Service - should throw an error if user is not found
Update Employee Service - should throw an error if updating employee fails
Create Manager Service - should be able to create a new manager
Create Manager Service - should hash the manager password before saving
Create Manager Service - should not allow creating a manager with an existing email
Fetch All Managers Service - should be able to fetch all managers
Find Manager By Id Service - should be able to find a manager by ID
Find Manager By Id Service - should throw NoRecordsFoundError if manager is not found
Find Manager By User ID Service - should be able to find a manager by user ID
Find Manager By User ID Service - should return null if manager is not found
Update Manager Service - should be able to update a manager's information
Update Manager Service - should be able to update manager's information without changing the password
Update Manager Service - should throw NoRecordsFoundError if user is not found
Update Manager Service - should throw NoRecordsFoundError if manager is not found
Create Product Service - should be able to create a new product
Fetch All Product Service - should be able to fetch all products
Fetch Product By Id Service - should be able to fetch product by id
Fetch Product By Id Service - should not be able to fetch product with wrong id
Fetch Product By Id Service - should not be able to fetch inactive product
Inactivate Product Service - should be able to inactivate a product by id
Inactivate Product Service - should not be able to inactivate a product with wrong id
PatchProductService - should update product data if product exists and is active
PatchProductService - should throw an error if product does not exist
PatchProductService - should throw an error if product is inactive
Reduce Product Stock Service - should reduce stock successfully when there is sufficient stock
Reduce Product Stock Service - should throw ResourceNotFoundError if the product does not exist
Reduce Product Stock Service - should throw an error if product stock information is missing
Reduce Product Stock Service - should throw an error if there is insufficient stock
Create Purchase Service - should create a purchase with valid products
Create Purchase Service - should throw an error if a product is not found
Create Purchase Service - should throw an error if a product is inactive
FetchAllPurchaseBySupplierIdService - should fetch all purchases by supplier id
FetchAllPurchaseBySupplierIdService - should throw ResourceNotFoundError if supplier does not exist
FetchAllPurchaseByUserIdService - should fetch all purchases by user id
FetchAllPurchaseByUserIdService - should throw ResourceNotFoundError if user does not exist
FetchAllPurchaseService - should fetch all purchases
FetchAllPurchaseService - should return an empty array if no purchases exist
FindPurchaseByIdService - should find a purchase by id
FindPurchaseByIdService - should throw ResourceNotFoundError if purchase does not exist
Create Sale Service - should be able to create a new sale
Create Sale Service - should throw an error if a product is not found
Create Sale Service - should throw an error if a product is inactive
Create Sale Service - should throw an error if a stock product is null
Create Sale Service - should throw an error if there is insufficient stock
FetchAllSaleByUserIdService - deve buscar todas as vendas de um usuário existente
FetchAllSaleByUserIdService - deve lançar um erro se o usuário não for encontrado
FetchAllSaleService - deve buscar todas as vendas
FetchAllSaleService - deve retornar uma lista vazia se não houver vendas
FindSaleByIdService - deve encontrar uma venda pelo ID
FindSaleByIdService - deve lançar um erro se a venda não for encontrada
Create Supplier Service - should be able to create a new supplier
Delete Supplier Service - should be able to delete a supplier by ID
Delete Supplier Service - should throw an error if the supplier does not exist
Fetch All Supplier Service - should be able to fetch all suppliers
Fetch Many Supplier By Company Name Service - should be able to fetch suppliers by company name
Fetch Many Supplier By Social Name Service - should be able to fetch suppliers by social name
Fetch Many Supplier By Social Name Service - should be able to fetch suppliers by multiple social names
Fetch Many Supplier By Social Name Service - should throw NoRecordsFoundError if no suppliers are found for the given social name
Find Supplier By Id Service - should be able to find a supplier by ID
Find Supplier By Id Service - should throw NoRecordsFoundError if supplier is not found
PatchSupplierService - should update supplier data if supplier exists
PatchSupplierService - should throw an error if supplier does not exist
Authenticate Service - should be able to authenticate
Authenticate Service - should not be able to authenticate with wrong email
Authenticate Service - should not be able to authenticate with wrong password
Delete User Service - should be able to delete a user by ID
Delete User Service - should throw an error if the user does not exist
Get All Users Service - should return all users
Get User By ID Service - should return the user when the user exists
Get User By ID Service - should throw a ResourceNotFoundError when the user does not exist
Get User Profile Service - should be able to get user profile
Get User Profile Service - should not be able to get user profile with wrong id
